snippet: October’s playoffs can be fickle, but you cannot quibble with the Yankees needing a September surge and all 162 games to win their division.
abstract: Harvey Araton On Baseball column says that October's playoffs can be fickle, but no one can quibble with the New York Yankees needing a September surge and all 162 games of the regular season to win the American League East title.
lead_paragraph: October’s playoffs can be fickle, but you cannot quibble with the Yankees needing a September surge and all 162 games to win their division.

headline.seo: It’s a Gift When All 162 Baseball Games Matter — Harvey Araton
headline.main: Let’s Play 162: It’s a Gift When They All Matter
headline.print_headline: Let’s Play 162: It’s a Gift When They All Matter
